channel.title: Computer's in general
channel.description: I have a desktop computer... (dell). and when i turn it on, it starts up and then i go to log on my account and it tells me i have malware that should be taken care of using my software... but by the time the computer finishes loading to where i can click something (like anti-virus scan thing) it restarts. When i log in with safe mode the scanner i have is rarely used so i need to connect to the internet to verify my account, and in safe mode my internet doesn't work. So um... any ideas of how to fix the shit?

item.title: Computer's in general
item.dc:creator: @bmw981 bmw981
item.description:
@bmw981 wrote:

I have a desktop computer… (dell). and when i turn it on, it starts up and then i go to log on my account and it tells me i have malware that should be taken care of using my software… but by the time the computer finishes loading to where i can click something (like anti-virus scan thing) it restarts. When i log in with safe mode the scanner i have is rarely used so i need to connect to the internet to verify my account, and in safe mode my internet doesn’t work. So um… any ideas of how to fix the shit?

Read full topic
